name: T.I.M.E.
description:
A fast-paced rhythm FPS game! Shoot to the beat and don’t lose your groove. The better in sync you take actions to the beat, the better perks you gain! Deal more damage when you shoot perfectly in sync to a beat! Get bigger magazine clips with bigger combos! Bounce to the beat to increase your combo! Reload to the beat and hasten your reload time!

Controls:

Move: W,A,S,D
Shoot: Mouse 1 (Left Click)
Jump: Space
Reload: R

Credits:

Game Design: GummiGamer

Music and sound design: mbg180

Programming: Aluvea, ForeverAFK, glasswindow

As part of the requirements of the GameDev.TV Game jam, a link to our code and sources can be found in our GitHub repository:  https://github.com/Aluvea/GameDev.Tv-Game-Jam
